Serialized Form

Package ex52

Class ex52.BouncingBall extends java.applet.Applet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

color

java.awt.Color color
Color of ball

radius

int radius
Radius of ball

delay

int delay
Refresh rate of bouncing ball. Default value is 100 mills, but can be set by applet parameter 'delay'

x

int x
X coordinate of center of the ball

y

int y
Y coordinate of center of the ball

dx

int dx
Variable that determines pixel amount of horizontal movement of the ball per delay time

dy

int dy
Variable that determines pixel amount of vertical movement of the ball per delay time

image

java.awt.Image image
Image to show actual ball.

offscreen

java.awt.Graphics offscreen
Graphics object used to implement off-screen drawing.

d

java.awt.Dimension d
Variable used to hold applet's dimensions.

bouncingThread

java.lang.Thread bouncingThread
Thread that refreshes screen every delay seconds.
